#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
typedef long long int LL;
typedef unsigned long long ULL;
typedef long double LD;
 
 
typedef pair<int,int> PII; //pair of ints
typedef pair<LL,LL> PLL; //pair of long long int
typedef vector<int> VI; //vector of ints
typedef vector<LL> VLL; //vector of LL
typedef vector<PII> VII; //vector of pair of ints
typedef vector<VII> VVII; //vector of vector of pairs
typedef set<int> SI; //set of ints
typedef set<PII> SII; //set of pairs
typedef set<LL> SLL; //set of LL
typedef map<int,int> MPII; //map of ints
 
 
 
#define initial -1
#define visited 0
#define finished 1
 
 
#define pb push_back
#define ppb pop_back
#define mp make_pair
#define F first
#define S second
 
 
#define PI acos(-1.0)
#define e exp(1.0)
#define EPS 1e-18
#define dbg(vari) cout<<#vari<<" = "<<(vari)<<endl
#define SP system("pause")
#define count_1(NUM) __builtin_popcount(NUM)
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define clr(A,n) for(int z1=0;z1<n;++z1) A[z1]=0
#define fill(A,n,val) for(int z1=0;z1<n;++z1) A[z1]=val
#define rep(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;++i)
#define revrep(i,b,a) for(i=b;i>=a;--i)
#define test() int tt; scanf("%d",&tt);while(tt--)
#define printV(A,n) cout<<"\n";int ti;rep(ti,0,n-1) cout<<ti<<" -- > "<<A[ti]<<"\n"
#define printG(W,n) cout<<"\n";int ti,tj;rep(ti,1,n){cout<<ti<<" --> ";rep(tj,0,(int)W[ti].size()-1) cout<<W[ti][tj].F<<" ";cout<<"\n";}
#define printVP(Z,n) cout<<"\n";int ti;rep(ti,0,n-1){cout<<ti<<" --> "<<Z[ti].F<<" "<<Z[ti].S<<endl;}
#define printMP(Z) cout<<"\n";for(MPII::const_iterator zt = Z.begin(); zt != Z.end(); zt++) cout<<zt->F<<" --> "<<zt->S<<"\n"
#define dks cout<<" ----- I am Here -----"<<endl
 
 
 
 
//const string SML="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
//const string CAP="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ";
//const string NUM="0123456789";
 
 
 
#define MAX 10007
#define MOD 1000000007
#define INF 1061109567
 
 
 
inline int LIS(int Arr[], int Siz)
{
    int i,j;
    int temp[Siz];
    
    //intialization
    temp[0]=Arr[0];
    int len=1,low,high,mid;
    
    rep(i,1,Siz-1)
    {
        if(Arr[i]== temp[0] || Arr[i] == temp[len-1])
        continue;
        
        if( Arr[i] < temp[0] )
        temp[0]= Arr[i];
        else
        if( Arr[i] > temp[len-1])
        temp[len++] = Arr[i];
        else
        {
            low=0,high=len-1;
            while(low<=high)
            {
                mid=(high+low)/2;
                if(temp[mid]==Arr[i])
                break;
                if(temp[mid]<Arr[i] && Arr[i]<temp[mid+1])
                {
                    temp[mid+1]=Arr[i];
                    break;
                }
                if(temp[mid]<Arr[i])  low=mid+1;
                else   high=mid-1;
            }
        }
    }
    return len;
}
 
int main()
{
test()
{
int i,n;
cin>>n;
int A[n];
rep(i,0,n-1)
cin>>A[i];
cout<< LIS(A,n)<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
